option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
filenames of the rawacf format files. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input.
files are in the raw (dat) format.
filename of the raw (dat) format file.

synopsis.p: Determines the program identifier numbers in rawacf or raw (dat) format files.

description.p: Determines the program identifier numbers in rawacf or raw (dat) format files.
The total number of program identifiers followed by a list of the identifier numbers is written to standard output.

example.description: Find the program identifier numbers in the raw file "20030408.gbr.raw".
